list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Patch Notes V.25.0
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: - Limits the level of a player every chapter: • Chapter 1 - level 8 • Chapter 2 - level 12 • Chapter 3 - level 18 • Chapter 4 - level 22 • Chapter 5 - level 30 - Warns players when exploring the area without a weapon
ADJUSTMENTS: - Max stack for buff potions are reduced from: 12 -> 5 - Player name is now 15 characters long
SYNTAX CHANGES: - Removed List<Item> items inside Initialization - Removed ColorUtil inside Initialization

task.summary: Default task
Added Gold Yield after battle Adjusted Gold Yield both loot chests and battle aftermath Adjusted the values for all Weapons

Changes: Fixed the shop where weapon cannot be purchased when already owned Added arrow up symbol when buff is active under display stats Displays the amount of HP healed Displays consumable item info before selecting/purchasing an item Added minor changes in displaying info in every consumable item Added confirm choices when selling item/s Fixed magic defense display Added defense under displayStats() Added currency under displayStats() Multipliers now displays in whole number Added Gold Yield after battle Adjusted Gold Yield both loot chests and battle aftermath Adjusted the values for all Weapons
TODO: Display character stats surrounded by a box dynamically (refer to todo comment) Add display info in weapons (skills and lore of said weapon) Add currency name fitted for the world of Akhai

Patch Notes V18
Changes: Fixed array out of bounds when selecting back in sellItem() method.

Patch Notes V18
Changes: Fixed array out of bounds when selecting back in sellItem() method. Fixed an issue where buff potion consumption does not reset

Patch Notes V18
Changes: Fixed array out of bounds when selecting back in sellItem() method. Fixed an issue where buff potion consumption does not reset Adjusted item selling price from 25%->75%

Patch Notes V18
Changes: Fixed array out of bounds when selecting back in sellItem() method. Fixed an issue where buff potion consumption does not reset Adjusted item selling price from 25%->75% Fixed an issue where gold coins can't be properly obtain

Patch Notes V18
Changes: Fixed array out of bounds when selecting back in sellItem() method. Fixed an issue where buff potion consumption does not reset Adjusted item selling price from 25%->75% Fixed an issue where gold coins can't be properly obtain Fixed an issue display where player and enemy stats is not shown after consuming potions during battle Added both player and enemy health display after consuming potions during battle

Patch Notes V19
Changes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon

Patch Notes V20
Changes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475
Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear

Patch Notes V20
Changes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475 Adjusted the prices for all items in the shop
Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear

Patch Notes V20
Changes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475 Adjusted the prices for all items in the shop Added try catch and confirmation text while players are entering their name Added orange color under ConsoleColors.java and ColorUtil.java
Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear

Patch Notes V20
Changes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475 Adjusted the prices for all items in the shop Added try catch and confirmation text while players are entering their name Added orange color under ConsoleColors.java and ColorUtil.java Added item description during item selection inside the inventory
Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear

Patch Notes V.20.
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: Added try catch and confirmation text while players are entering their name Added orange color under ConsoleColors.java and ColorUtil.java Added item description during item selection inside the inventory Added skill multiplier display for each weapons
ADJUSTMENTS: Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475 Adjusted the prices for all items in the shop Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear
BUG Fixes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon

Patch Notes V.20.
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: Added try catch and confirmation text while players are entering their name Added orange color under ConsoleColors.java and ColorUtil.java Added item description during item selection inside the inventory Added skill multiplier display for each weapons
ADJUSTMENTS: Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475 Adjusted the prices for all items in the shop Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear
BUG Fixes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon

Patch Notes V.20.1
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: Added try catch and confirmation text while players are entering their name Added orange color under ConsoleColors.java and ColorUtil.java Added item description during item selection inside the inventory Added skill multiplier display for each weapons
ADJUSTMENTS: Adjusted the chances for loot chests each chapter Adjusted BOSS Edge-Lord Zedjy's HP from 900 -> 475 Adjusted the prices for all items in the shop Explore method: (Zed) - (Nerf) Elite enemies now only have 25% chance to appear - (NEW) Common enemies now spawn on chapter 3 with a 75% chance to appear
BUG Fixes: Fixed an issue where players can obtain duplicated weapons Fixed an issue where selecting an empty slot inside the inventory, an error occured Fixed a display issue when equipping another weapon over the equipped weapon

- Added healAfterBattle - Recovers ~~50%~~ -> 25% of lost HP after battle - Added an outside of battle display for HP, Exp, and Energy
Bosses: - (Nerf) Chap 1 boss: - HP: 280 -> ~~180~~ -> 160 - Def: 15 -> 10 - (Nerf) Chap 2 boss: - HP: 300 -> ~~225~~ -> 200 - Def: 16 -> 11 - (Nerf) Chap 3 boss: - Attack: 65 -> 50 - Def: 17 -> 12 - (Nerf) Chap 4 boss: - HP: 700 -> ~~500~~ -> 600 - Def: 28-> 18 - (~) Demon King Din: - (Nerf) Def: 30 -> ~~20~~ -> 25 - (Buff) Waves: 2 -> 3
Elite enemies: - All elite enemies took too long to fight, so I decided to make things easier - (Nerf) HP: -50 - (Nerf) Speed: 19 -> 15
Issues: - Fixed an issue where not all legendary weapons have the same value, adjusted them accordingly - Price: 200 -> 150 - Found an issue where you can no longer grind and level up due to not having the option to explore in chapter 5 - Added "[1] Explore" as an option similar to previous chapters - Moved "[1] Enter the finale" to option [7] - Added option [8] - Moved "[7] Quit game" to option [8] - Fixed an issue where buying an existing item (not at max stack) with no more empty inventory slotscounts as inventory full
Other changes: - Removed GuideNPC class - Removed "already owned" display when a chest drops an already owned item - (Buff) Partially revert the gold yield from chests - Gold yield: 1-15 -> 5-35 - Turn display: - Indented to the middle (supposedly) - brightGreenBold (player) - brightRedBold (enemy) - Removed randomizeBoss method - Common items are now blueGreen - Added Character player parameter to handleLevelActions - Removed additional energy recovery after victory - Added a dynamic description display for potions - Made multiple display optimizations kapoy nag butang tanan taas kaayo ni if I do so

ADJUSTMENTS:
- Added healAfterBattle - Recovers ~~50%~~ -> 25% of lost HP after battle - Added an outside of battle display for HP, Exp, and Energy
Bosses: - (Nerf) Chap 1 boss: - HP: 280 -> ~~180~~ -> 160 - Def: 15 -> 10 - (Nerf) Chap 2 boss: - HP: 300 -> ~~225~~ -> 200 - Def: 16 -> 11 - (Nerf) Chap 3 boss: - Attack: 65 -> 50 - Def: 17 -> 12 - (Nerf) Chap 4 boss: - HP: 700 -> ~~500~~ -> 600 - Def: 28-> 18 - (~) Demon King Din: - (Nerf) Def: 30 -> ~~20~~ -> 25 - (Buff) Waves: 2 -> 3
Elite enemies: - All elite enemies took too long to fight, so I decided to make things easier - (Nerf) HP: -50 - (Nerf) Speed: 19 -> 15
Issues: - Fixed an issue where not all legendary weapons have the same value, adjusted them accordingly - Price: 200 -> 150 - Found an issue where you can no longer grind and level up due to not having the option to explore in chapter 5 - Added "[1] Explore" as an option similar to previous chapters - Moved "[1] Enter the finale" to option [7] - Added option [8] - Moved "[7] Quit game" to option [8] - Fixed an issue where buying an existing item (not at max stack) with no more empty inventory slotscounts as inventory full
OTHER CHANGES:
- Removed GuideNPC class - Removed "already owned" display when a chest drops an already owned item - (Buff) Partially revert the gold yield from chests - Gold yield: 1-15 -> 5-35 - Turn display: - Indented to the middle (supposedly) - brightGreenBold (player) - brightRedBold (enemy) - Removed randomizeBoss method - Common items are now blueGreen - Added Character player parameter to handleLevelActions - Removed additional energy recovery after victory - Added a dynamic description display for potions - Made multiple display optimizations kapoy nag butang tanan taas kaayo ni if I do so

Patch Notes V.21.2
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: - Healing Potion consumption in battle now has a maximum of 2 uses in a single turn.
ADJUSTMENTS:
- Added healAfterBattle - Recovers ~~50%~~ -> 25% of lost HP after battle - Added an outside of battle display for HP, Exp, and Energy

OTHER CHANGES:
- Removed GuideNPC class - Removed "already owned" display when a chest drops an already owned item - (Buff) Partially revert the gold yield from chests - Gold yield: 1-15 -> 5-35 - Turn display: - Indented to the middle (supposedly) - brightGreenBold (player) - brightRedBold (enemy) - Removed randomizeBoss method - Common items are now blueGreen - Added Character player parameter to handleLevelActions - Removed additional energy recovery after victory - Added a dynamic description display for potions - Made multiple display optimizations kapoy nag butang tanan taas kaayo ni if I do so

Patch Notes V.21.2
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: - Healing Potion consumption in battle now has a maximum of 2 uses in a single turn. - Added a boss before the end of every chapter. - The game and story ends after defeating the final boss
ADJUSTMENTS:
- Added healAfterBattle - Recovers ~~50%~~ -> 25% of lost HP after battle - Added an outside of battle display for HP, Exp, and Energy
Bosses: - (Nerf) Chap 1 boss: - HP: 280 -> ~~180~~ -> 160 - Def: 15 -> 10 - (Nerf) Chap 2 boss: - HP: 300 -> ~~225~~ -> 200 - Def: 16 -> 11 - (Nerf) Chap 3 boss: - Attack: 65 -> 50 - Def: 17 -> 12 - (Nerf) Chap 4 boss: - HP: 700 -> ~~500~~ -> 600 - Def: 28-> 18 - (~) Demon King Din: - (Nerf) Def: 30 -> ~~20~~ -> 25 - (Buff) Waves: 2 -> 3
Elite enemies: - All elite enemies took too long to fight, so I decided to make things easier - (Nerf) HP: -50 - (Nerf) Speed: 19 -> 15
BUG FIXES: - Fixed an issue where IllegalArgumentException occurs when player xp is 0 when displaying xp bar - Fixed an issue where not all legendary weapons have the same value, adjusted them accordingly - Price: 200 -> 150 - Found an issue where you can no longer grind and level up due to not having the option to explore in chapter 5 - Added "[1] Explore" as an option similar to previous chapters - Moved "[1] Enter the finale" to option [7] - Added option [8] - Moved "[7] Quit game" to option [8] - Fixed an issue where buying an existing item (not at max stack) with no more empty inventory slotscounts as inventory full
OTHER CHANGES: - Removed talkToNPC() - Removed GuideNPC class - Removed "already owned" display when a chest drops an already owned item - (Buff) Partially revert the gold yield from chests - Gold yield: 1-15 -> 5-35 - Turn display: - Indented to the middle (supposedly) - brightGreenBold (player) - brightRedBold (enemy) - Removed randomizeBoss method - Common items are now blueGreen - Added Character player parameter to handleLevelActions - Removed additional energy recovery after victory - Added a dynamic description display for potions - Made multiple display optimizations kapoy nag butang tanan taas kaayo ni if I do so

Other changes: - Removed GuideNPC class - Removed "already owned" display when a chest drops an already owned item - (Buff) Partially revert the gold yield from chests - Gold yield: 1-15 -> 5-35 - Turn display: - Indented to the middle (supposedly) - brightGreenBold (player) - brightRedBold (enemy) - Removed randomizeBoss method - Common items are now blueGreen - Added Character player parameter to handleLevelActions - Removed additional energy recovery after victory - Added a dynamic description display for potions - Made multiple display optimizations kapoy nag butang tanan taas kaayo ni if I do so

- Added healAfterBattle - Recovers ~~50%~~ -> 25% of lost HP after battle - Added an outside of battle display for HP, Exp, and Energy

Patch Notes V.21.2
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: - Healing Potion consumption in battle now has a maximum of 2 uses in a single turn. - Added a boss before the end of every chapter. - The game and story ends after defeating the final boss

BUG FIXES: - Fixed an issue where IllegalArgumentException occurs when player xp is 0 when displaying xp bar - Fixed an issue where not all legendary weapons have the same value, adjusted them accordingly - Price: 200 -> 150 - Found an issue where you can no longer grind and level up due to not having the option to explore in chapter 5 - Added "[1] Explore" as an option similar to previous chapters - Moved "[1] Enter the finale" to option [7] - Added option [8] - Moved "[7] Quit game" to option [8] - Fixed an issue where buying an existing item (not at max stack) with no more empty inventory slotscounts as inventory full

Patch Notes V.25.0
NEWLY ADDED FEATURES: - Limits the level of a player every chapter: • Chapter 1 - level 8 • Chapter 2 - level 12 • Chapter 3 - level 18 • Chapter 4 - level 22 • Chapter 5 - level 30 - Warns players when exploring the area without a weapon
ADJUSTMENTS: - Max stack for buff potions are reduced from: 12 -> 5 - Player name is now 15 characters long
SYNTAX CHANGES: - Removed List<Item> items inside Initialization - Removed ColorUtil inside Initialization
